1: -module(carboncopy_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: 
    4: -compile([export_all]).
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("proper/include/proper.hrl").
    7: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    8: 
    9: -define(ae(Expected, Actual), ?assertEqual(Expected, Actual)).
   10: 
   11: all() -> [{group, all}].
   12: 
   13: 
   14: groups() ->
   15:     [{all, [parallel,shuffle],
   16:       [discovering_support,
   17:                   enabling_carbons,
   18:                   disabling_carbons,
   19:                   avoiding_carbons,
   20:                   non_enabled_clients_dont_get_sent_carbons,
   21:                   non_enabled_clients_dont_get_received_carbons,
   22:                   enabled_single_resource_doesnt_get_carbons,
   23:        unavailable_resources_dont_get_carbons,
   24:        dropped_client_doesnt_create_duplicate_carbons,
   25:        prop_forward_received_chat_messages,
   26:        prop_forward_sent_chat_messages,
   27:        prop_normal_routing_to_bare_jid
   28:       ]}].
   29: 
   30: init_per_suite(C) -> escalus:init_per_suite(C).
   31: end_per_suite(C) -> escalus_fresh:clean(), escalus:end_per_suite(C).
   32: init_per_testcase(Name,C) -> escalus:init_per_testcase(Name,C).
   33: end_per_testcase(Name,C) -> escalus:end_per_testcase(Name,C).
   34: run_prop(PropName, Property) ->
   35:     ?ae(true, proper:quickcheck(proper:conjunction([{PropName, Property}]),
   36:                                 [verbose,long_result, {numtests, 3}])).
   37: 
   38: discovering_support(Config) ->
   39:     escalus:fresh_story(
   40:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   41:       fun(Alice) ->
   42:               IqGet = escalus_stanza:disco_info(<<"localhost">>),
   43:               escalus_client:send(Alice, IqGet),
   44:               Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   45:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, [IqGet], Result),
   46:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [<<"urn:xmpp:carbons:2">>], Result)
   47:       end).
   48: 
   49: enabling_carbons(Config) ->
   50:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun carbons_get_enabled/1).
   51: 
   52: disabling_carbons(Config) ->
   53:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   54:                   fun(Alice) -> carbons_get_enabled(Alice),
   55:                                 carbons_get_disabled(Alice) end).
   56: 
   57: avoiding_carbons(Config) ->
   58:     escalus:fresh_story(
   59:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   60:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   61:               carbons_get_enabled([Alice1,Alice2]),
   62:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_without_carbon_to(Bob,
   63:                                                           <<"And pious action">>),
   64:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
   65:               escalus:assert(
   66:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   67:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
   68:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   69:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
   70:       end).
   71: 
   72: non_enabled_clients_dont_get_sent_carbons(Config) ->
   73:     escalus:fresh_story(
   74:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   75:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   76:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"And pious action">>),
   77:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
   78:               escalus:assert(
   79:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   80:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
   81:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   82:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
   83:       end).
   84: 
   85: non_enabled_clients_dont_get_received_carbons(Config) ->
   86:     escalus:fresh_story(
   87:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
   88:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
   89:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice1, <<"And pious action">>),
   90:               escalus_client:send(Bob, Msg),
   91:               escalus:assert(
   92:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
   93:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1)),
   94:               escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
   95:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice2)
   96:       end).
   97: 
   98: 
   99: enabled_single_resource_doesnt_get_carbons(Config) ->
  100:     BobsMessages = [
  101:                     <<"There's such a thing as dwelling">>,
  102:                     <<"On the thought ourselves have nursed,">>,
  103:                     <<"And with scorn and courage telling">>,
  104:                     <<"The world to do its worst.">>
  105:                    ],
  106:     escalus:fresh_story(
  107:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  108:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  109:               carbons_get_enabled(Alice),
  110:               [ escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, M))
  111:                 || M <- BobsMessages ],
  112:               [ escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [M], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice))
  113:                 || M <- BobsMessages ]
  114:       end).
  115: 
  116: unavailable_resources_dont_get_carbons(Config) ->
  117:     escalus:fresh_story(
  118:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  119:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  120:         carbons_get_enabled(Alice1),
  121:         carbons_get_enabled(Alice2),
  122:         client_unsets_presence(Alice1),
  123:         _unavailable = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
  124: 
  125:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice2, <<"one">>)),
  126: 
  127:         client_sets_presence(Alice1),
  128:         %% no carbons for Alice1, only presences
  129:         escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence, is_presence],
  130:                                      escalus:peek_stanzas(Alice1))
  131:       end).
  132: 
  133: client_unsets_presence(Client) ->
  134:     escalus_client:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>)),
  135:     timer:sleep(100).
  136: 
  137: client_sets_presence(Client) ->
  138:     escalus_client:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  139:     timer:sleep(100).
  140: 
  141: 
  142: dropped_client_doesnt_create_duplicate_carbons(Config) ->
  143:     escalus:fresh_story(
  144:       Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}],
  145:       fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  146:               Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"And pious action">>),
  147:               given_client_logs_out(Alice2),
  148:               _Pres = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  149: 
  150:               escalus_client:send(Alice1, Msg),
  151:               escalus:assert(
  152:                 is_chat_message, [<<"And pious action">>],
  153:                 escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  154:               [] = escalus_client:peek_stanzas(Alice1)
  155:       end).
  156: 
  157: prop_forward_received_chat_messages(Config) ->
  158:     run_prop
  159:       (forward_received,
  160:     ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(), utterance()},
  161:                true_story
  162:                  (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  163:                        fun(Users) ->
  164:                                all_bobs_other_resources_get_received_carbons(Users,Msg)
  165:                   end))).
  166: 
  167: prop_forward_sent_chat_messages(Config) ->
  168:     run_prop
  169:         (forward_sent,
  170:     ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(),utterance()},
  171:                  true_story
  172:                    (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  173:                        fun(Users) ->
  174:                                all_bobs_other_resources_get_sent_carbons(Users,Msg)
  175:                     end))).
  176: 
  177: prop_normal_routing_to_bare_jid(Config) ->
  178:     run_prop
  179:         (normal_routing,
  180:     ?FORALL({N,Msg}, {no_of_resources(),utterance()},
  181:                  true_story
  182:                    (Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, N}],
  183:                        fun(Users) ->
  184:                                all_bobs_resources_get_message_to_bare_jid(Users,Msg)
  185:                     end))).
  186: 
  187: 
  188: 
  189: %%
  190: %% Test scenarios w/assertions
  191: %%
  192: 
  193: all_bobs_resources_get_message_to_bare_jid([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  194:     %% All connected resources receive messages sent
  195:     %% to the user's bare JID without carbon wrappers.
  196:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  197:     escalus_client:send(
  198:       Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob1), Msg)),
  199:     GotMsg = fun(BobsResource) ->
  200:                      escalus:assert(
  201:                        is_chat_message,
  202:                        [Msg],
  203:                        escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  204:                      escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource)
  205:              end,
  206:     lists:foreach(GotMsg, [Bob1|Bobs]).
  207: 
  208: all_bobs_other_resources_get_received_carbons([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  209:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  210:     escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob1, Msg)),
  211:     GotForward = fun(BobsResource) ->
  212:                          escalus:assert(
  213:                            is_forwarded_received_message,
  214:                            [escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  215:                             escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  216:                             Msg],
  217:                            escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  218:                          escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource) end,
  219:     lists:foreach(GotForward, Bobs).
  220: 
  221: all_bobs_other_resources_get_sent_carbons([Alice,Bob1|Bobs], Msg) ->
  222:     carbons_get_enabled([Bob1|Bobs]),
  223:     escalus_client:send(Bob1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, Msg)),
  224:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  225:     GotCarbon = fun(BobsResource) ->
  226:                         escalus:assert(
  227:                           is_forwarded_sent_message,
  228:                           [escalus_client:full_jid(Bob1),
  229:                            escalus_client:full_jid(Alice),
  230:                            Msg],
  231:                           escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(BobsResource)),
  232:                         escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(BobsResource) end,
  233:     lists:foreach(GotCarbon, Bobs).
  234: 
  235: carbons_get_disabled(ClientOrClients) ->
  236:     disable_carbons(ClientOrClients).
  237: 
  238: carbons_get_enabled(ClientOrClients) ->
  239:     enable_carbons(ClientOrClients).
  240: 
  241: 
  242: %%
  243: %% Internal helpers
  244: %%
  245: 
  246: given_client_logs_out(Client) ->
  247:     escalus_client:stop(Client),
  248:     timer:sleep(300).
  249: 
  250: %% Wrapper around escalus:story. Returns PropEr result.
  251: true_story(Config, UserSpecs, TestFun) ->
  252:     try   escalus:fresh_story(Config, UserSpecs, TestFun), true
  253:     catch E ->
  254:               ct:pal("~p", [E]),
  255:               {error, E}
  256:     end.
  257: 
  258: %% Number of resources per users
  259: no_of_resources() -> random:uniform(4).
  260: 
  261: %% A sample chat message
  262: utterance() ->
  263:     proper_types:oneof(
  264:       [<<"Now, fair Hippolyta, our nuptial hour">>,
  265:        <<"Draws on apace; four happy days bring in">>,
  266:        <<"Another moon: but, O, methinks, how slow">>,
  267:        <<"This old moon wanes! she lingers my desires">>,
  268:        <<"Like to a step-dame or a dowager">>,
  269:        <<"Long withering out a young man revenue.">>]).
  270: 
  271: 
  272: enable_carbons(Clients) when is_list(Clients) ->
  273:     lists:foreach(fun enable_carbons/1, Clients);
  274: enable_carbons(Client) ->
  275:     IqSet = escalus_stanza:carbons_enable(),
  276:     escalus_client:send(Client, IqSet),
  277:     Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  278:     escalus:assert(is_iq, [<<"result">>], Result).
  279: 
  280: 
  281: disable_carbons(Clients) when is_list(Clients) ->
  282:     lists:foreach(fun disable_carbons/1, Clients);
  283: disable_carbons(Client) ->
  284:     IqSet = escalus_stanza:carbons_disable(),
  285:     escalus_client:send(Client, IqSet),
  286:     Result = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  287:     escalus:assert(is_iq, [<<"result">>], Result).
